text: All moneys received from fines, forfeitures, and penalties shall be paid into the Treasury of the United States to the credit of the General Fund of the District of Columbia.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 43-312.

1973 Ed., § 43-912.

DC CODE § 34-710

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Fines, penalties and forfeitures to be paid into Treasury.
